meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of the April 23, 2024 Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Economic Cost of Homelessness in Dallas and Collin Counties
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the economic impact of homelessness in the specified counties.

agenda_items.title: Temporary and Alternate Housing Best Practices and Recommendation
agenda_items.description: Presentation on best practices and recommendations for temporary and alternate housing.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions - FY 2024-25 Budget Briefing
agenda_items.description: Briefing on the budget for the Office of Homeless Solutions for the fiscal year 2024-25.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Authorize an amendment to the Dallas Housing Resource Catalog
agenda_items.description: Discussion on amending the Dallas Housing Resource Catalog to implement proposed development program and policy changes.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Permanent Supportive Housing NOFA - 1950 Fort Worth Avenue
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the Notice of Funding Availability for Permanent Supportive Housing.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Notice of Funding Availability Development and Dallas Public Facility Corporation Project
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the funding availability for the Park at Northpoint project.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Request for a Resolution of No Objection for 4% Non-Competitive Housing Tax Credits
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the Legacy on Kiest Project and the request for a resolution.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: FY 2023 TDHCA - Homeless Housing and Services Program Reallocation Fund
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the reallocation fund for the Homeless Housing and Services Program.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Office of Homeless Solutions - Master Leasing Program Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Master Leasing Program by the Office of Homeless Solutions.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization Properties Update
agenda_items.description: Update on properties managed by the Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing and Neighborhood Revitalization.

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homelessness Solutions (HHS) Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of briefing items to be placed on the HHS Committee agendas for upcoming meetings.
